author: mtosi
body: in order to be able to monitor reco::GsfTrack by using the already well advanced DQM/TrackMonitor the reco::TrackCollection has been changed into edm::View code changes have been tested by running `runTheMatrix -l limited` and all workflows seem fine in addition, we have --finally-- (filled) distributions for hltGsfTracks @rovere @VinInn @gpasztor @dmitrijus @vanbesien
title: edm::View<reco::Track> instead of reco::TrackCollection in DQM/TrackingMonitor
